thread.title: Uber global job openings tripled this year thanks to aggressive push in China and India
thread.title_full: Uber global job openings tripled this year thanks to aggressive push in China and India - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Uber global job openings tripled this year thanks to aggressive push in China and India
text: At the rate Uber is expanding, it may be only a matter of time before we’re all working for the San Francisco ride-hailing service. According to an update published by Silk.co, a data visualization company, Uber had 1,332 job openings in 69 countries last month, up from 435 job listings in 46 countries one year […] »
